game.name: Prominence Poker
game.genres: Casual, Massively Multiplayer, Simulation, Strategy, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: Prominence Poker에 오신 것을 환영합니다. Prominence Poker는 최고 중 최고가 되기 위해 필요한 평판, 명성, 자금을 구축하기 위해 전 세계 플레이어와 교활한 AI를 겨루는 카드 게임입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to Prominence Poker, a card game that pits players from around the world against each other – and devious AI – to build the rep, prestige, and bankroll needed to be, and beat, the best of the best.

reviewHighlights.text: Yes, it's the best Texas Hold'em poker game made for PC. (That's still the reason I'm recommending it.) But Flush beats Flush. Three of a Kind keeps g...
[h1]521 Hours In – Prominence Poker is a Masterclass in Online Poker Mechanics[/h1] After 521 hours, I can confidently say Prominence Poker stands out...
